name: The Battle For Nydra
description:
A dragon has destroyed the village of Nydra.. and you must slay it!

Play as Alex and chase the dragon around a wacky turn-based RPG world!

!!!THIS IS THE DEMO AND NOT THE FULL VERSION OF THE GAME!!!

If you would like to support the game, join our Discord server and subscribe to our YouTube channel!

Discord: https://discord.gg/YVpdAFEMHb

YouTube channel: https://youtube.com/channel/UCF_PptSScJpprlXexdOJU0w

Updates are contained on the Updates devlog page.

Made with RPG Maker MV
